zapzap

!!, zapzap, [%zpzp p=~] is a natural hoon that crashes every time.

Definition

++  twig  
  $%  [%zpzp p=~]
  ==

Regular form (wide)

!!

Compilation

++  mint
  ?-  gen
    [%zpzp *]  [%void [%0 0]]
  ==

Notes

Crashing in Hoon is the normal way to respond to an error.
